name: At Home Alone Final
description:
CHARACTERS INTRO:



A lively girl walks around in
a white dress everyday.


A boy who suddenly appeared
at the girl's door stood there
and didn't know why.


A blonde-hair girl holding a
chihuahua


The girl's mother goes out to
work early and comes back late.


The elder bother who searched
for his little brother


？？？

THE INTRODUCTION TO THE GAME:

The girl's mother went to to work,
leaving her alone at home.
In the empty and quiet house,
what interesting things are we going to do!

Sneak into the parents' room,
or go disco dancing on the cot,
or play wings and hide-and-seek with friends in the backyard,
or play with te dogs and cats by the road,
share delicious snacks, and so on--

Maybe some wonderful stories will happen,
or maybe there's a visit from someone you don't know.
There might even be some mysterious visitors.

maybe……

THE CHARACTERISTICS OF THE GAME:

  • lovely and healing style
  • plot with branches
  • weird unfolding
  • interesting adventures
